course.subject: PPOL
course.name: Managing for Sustainability
course.description: Sustainable development problems pose some of the greatest challenges for both private and public sector organizations around the world, and effective policy design requires manager with strong subject matter understanding, creativity, and the ability to incorporate diverse perspectives and approaches to sustainability. The goal of this course is to advance studentsâ€™ abilities to apply managerial principle, tools and methods to ensure sustainable development at organizational, sector and system levels.
